nodes.text: Bonbraks were a diminutive hairy sentient species. Several Bonbraks worked in the garage of the Jedi Padawan Ram Jomaram during the High Republic Era. A cluster of Bonbraks were present on Freerago's Satellite Diner and Motel when the bounty hunters Zuckuss and 4-LOM were interviewed by Parazeen Parapa for the Galactic Digest.
